SELECT so.store_order_id, so.store_order_subject, so.store_order_status, so.store_order_memo, so.created_at, sod.product_id, p.product_name, sod.store_order_detail_quantity, sod.created_at FROM store_order so JOIN store_order_detail sod ON so.store_order_id = sod.store_order_id JOIN product p ON sod.product_id = p.product_id WHERE so.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId}
AND so.store_order_status IN ('1')
AND so.store_order_status IN ('2', '3')
ORDER BY so.created_at DESC
